replies.body: The patch notes are aimed to release some new skins, but I don't have any info on when exactly that will be.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates on that.  Hold on to the hype, and hang tight!

I'm not part of the skins or marketing teams, so we truly have no visibility on content release dates.  If that image is true, then awesome!  We'll know a skin becomes available as soon as you do.  The day is still young.
Yeah, they w8 for Korean time that SKT can promote their skins, so keep calm and relax :D
Hoozah!  The [announcement splash ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/skt-t1-2016-skins-now-available)is also available.  They will go to the vault on 7/19/15, 23:59 PT, so get it while you can!
